def find_max_deviation(arr):
    min_val = min((min(sub) for sub in arr))
    max_val = max((max(sub) for sub in arr))
    return max_val + min_val

def find_max_deviation(arr):
    min_val = min((min(sub) for sub in arr))
    max_val = max((max(sub) for sub in arr))
    return max_val * min_val
